creator: jgodea@kfbs.com
text:
We have Apache on 5 servers here.  They all show the time as 6 hours ahead of 
what it should be in the mod_jserv.log.  All other log files are correct time.  
The version # is actually 1.3.12.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
The Jserv project really isn't being maintained... bugs are still tracked
  in the old http://bugs.apache.org/ database.

  Suggest that you move to mod_jk to resolve this issue and use a supported
  servlet platform.
